english.segment1: I'm aching, transparent. Your eyes see right through me. I'm dependent and shaking. I'm falling to my knees
english.segment2: And I can't contain this. You're the only one I need. I'm hooked and I cannot hide it. Your love's controlling me
english.segment3: You're the core of my addiction. I want to live, want to lose myself in You. You're the heart of my obsession. I want to live, but I would die for You. I'm addicted
english.segment4: Impulsive, enraptured. This yearning's captured me. I'm determined, I'm not pretending. You are my destiny
english.segment5: I can feel the freedom. You're the only one I need. I'm alive and finally breathing. You're my recovery
english.segment6: God, I've waited for this day. I'll never run away. And You won't have to chase me
english.segment7: I'm addicted. I'm addicted to You
